product_name: WTB Bronson TCS 29er Foldable Tire - 29 x 2.2
long_description: Boasting an open tread pattern and confidence-inspiring handling in a variety of conditions, the WTB Bronson TCS 29er foldable mountain bike tire is a sure-fire way to up your 29er's traction game. Tubeless Compatible System (TCS) design (requires sealant, sold separately) features a supple 120 tpi casing with folding, UST-compatible aramid bead. The linked, widely spaced tread design supplies versatile and confident handling on dry hardpack to muddy slop. Ramped center knobs roll fast while the terraced side knobs offer responsive traction throughout your turns. DNA rubber compound is formulated for high-performance riding; dual-density construction optimizes grip and wear along shoulders and crown. 29er version of the WTB Bronson TCS Foldable tire is available in a versatile 2.2 in. width for sure handling on your big-wheelin' adventures.
short_description: Boasting an open tread pattern and confidence-inspiring handling in a variety of conditions, the WTB Bronson TCS 29er foldable mountain bike tire is a sure-fire way to up your 29er's traction game.
